# Anchor (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M

**Range:** 1 ship

**Area:** See text

**Duration:** 2 hours/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Dead Man's Chest (Necromancer Games), pg. 121

This spell maintains a shipâ€™s position against currents, holding ships weighing up to 10 tons per caster level. The material components are small bit of iron and a piece of string.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* This spell can be cast upon air and land vehicles, effectively holding them in place so long as they are within the caster limitations.
